Package interpreter

Class Interpreter

java.lang.Object
interpreter.Interpreter
public class Interpreter extends Object
Class creating a interpreter for the drawing langage.

  • Field Details

    • END_OF_SCRIPT

      public static final int END_OF_SCRIPT
      Constant for return result possible after an instruction as been executed

      Indicated that the interpreter is at the end of the script (no instruction left)

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INSTRUCTION_EXECUTED

      public static final int INSTRUCTION_EXECUTED
      Constant for return result possible after an instruction as been executed

      An instruction with change on the drawing canvas as been done

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INSTRUCTION_SKIPED

      public static final int INSTRUCTION_SKIPED
      Constant for return result possible after an instruction as been executed

      indicated that the instruction is empty or doesnt look like one and it as been skiped

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PROCESSE_DONE

      public static final int PROCESSE_DONE
      Constant for return result possible after an instruction as been executed

      Indicated that an instrcution with no change on the drawing canvas as been done

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • onEndOfSCript

      public Function<Interpreter,Integer> onEndOfSCript
      Store a Function that will be executed when the interpreter as no instructions left

      Parameters:
      parentTab - DrawingTab where the Interpreter will execute on
      instructions - String of all the instruction
      defaultDefinedVariables - List of already defined variables

      Parameters:

      interpreter.Exceptions.SyntaxError - if { } count doesnt match

    • setIntruction

      public void setIntruction(List<String> parsedInstructions) throws interpreter.Exceptions.SyntaxError
      Set the instruction that need to be
      Parameters:
      parsedInstructions - List of already parsed instruction, aka list of instruction line per line
      Throws:
      interpreter.Exceptions.SyntaxError - if { } count doesnt match

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Set an interpreter as if no instruction as ever been executed

    • runNextInstruction

      public int runNextInstruction() throws interpreter.Exceptions.SyntaxError, interpreter.Exceptions.InvalidArgument
      Execute the next instruction in List
      Returns:
      INSTRUCTION_EXECUTED, END_OF_SCRIPT, PROCESSE_DONE or INSTRUCTION_SKIPED
      Throws:
      interpreter.Exceptions.SyntaxError
      interpreter.Exceptions.InvalidArgument
